title: KDA Katarina !!
body:
KDA katarina 

Suits her perfectly !! 

RIOT please take my money !!

replies.body:
She's PERFECT , RITO don't miss that beauty pls
{{champion:55}}  {{champion:55}}  {{champion:55}}  {{champion:55}}  {{champion:55}}  <333333333
Revive this post pls. True damage got realesed and nothing about this. WE NEED THIS
You've got a girl who turns into a dragon, a blind monk who lands skillshots, and a broken champion who has mastery 7 but still goes 0/16 when on your team, and you think her thigh gap is unreal?

> [{quoted}](name=Blackfin97,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Hk1Ee9a8,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-01-30T19:18:53.468+0000)
>
> You've got a girl who turns into a dragon, a blind monk who lands skillshots, and a broken champion who has mastery 7 but still goes 16/0 when on your team, and you think her thigh gap is unreal?

Huh? No. I meant unreal as in great.
Pls Rito take all my money for thisss! ;~;
WOOOOW WHAT A BEAUTY SKIN CONCEPT
Hey kata need this kda skin I think it would be an ultimate skin, with special sentence or change the hair color. That would be nice
Man if this is a real skin I’ll buy it for sure! It’s so nice seeing a kda katarina skin! Always wanted katarina to join kda
It is good, but I feel like if Rito does it, they would have to tweak the design because there are parts that suit her, and others that don't

Yes true but overall 
the skin itself suits her badass theme  {{champion:55}}

Im sorry but in my opinion, I very much prefer to keep it the original four. The skin concept is great...Only as a skin concept. Adding more members to the K/DA band will be at least for me, unprofessional and chaotic. K/DA is perfect just the way it is with their original four members. :)
